title: Ukraine war briefing: Lithuania accuses Russia of further Nato airspace violation
description: Eurofighters scramble after incursion by fighter and tanker; Russian anti-tank drone kills two Ukrainian journalists at petrol station. What we know on day 1,339
content: Lithuania said two Russian planes entered its airspace on Thursday: a Sukhoi SU-30 fighter and an IL-78 tanker flying from the Russian exclave of Kaliningrad. In response, Nato scrambled two Typhoon Eurofighters from its air patrol mission in the Bal... [4268 chars]

title: Irish presidential election: Voters head to the polls
description: The winning candidate will become the country's 10th president and replace Michael D Higgins.
content:
Voters in the Republic of Ireland are heading to the polls to elect a new president of Ireland.
The winning candidate will become the country's 10th president, replacing the current head of state Michael D Higgins.

title: Airport expansion will put UK’s net zero goal in ‘serious jeopardy’, MPs warn
description: Committee urges ministers to set out measures to reduce carbon emissions before work starts on new runways
content:
Airport expansion plans backed by the government are putting the UK’s net zero target in “serious jeopardy”, MPs have warned.
Without new safeguards, proposals to enlarge airports including Heathrow and Gatwick could push the UK over its carbon budge... [2779 chars]
